about_the_game:
Femdom Game World - is a fascinating series of video games, the story centers on strong and sexy women who exercise dominance over men and more. In these games, players are immersed in a world where female domination reigns in all aspects of relationships, providing a unique gaming experience. Experience an exciting world of lust and depravity in Femdom Game World.



Story:

Ethan was a young boy living with his aunt, in a cozy house on the outskirts of town. He was surrounded from childhood by the care and attention of his aunt, who replaced his parents. However, Ethan had a secret dream, which he did not dare to talk about for a long time. He wanted to become a slave for his aunt, to obey her in everything and fulfill her every whim. But how to offer her such a thing? Thinking long and hard about his actions, Ethan decided to start small. One evening, when his aunt came home after a long day at work, he timidly offered to give her a foot massage, hoping it would be the first step toward his dream. The aunt, a woman of discernment and intelligence, immediately realized what was involved. She saw in her nephew's eyes a sincere desire and, realizing his intentions, took the situation into her own hands. Soon she began to give him more and more assignments and tasks. So, gradually, Ethan became her faithful servant, fulfilling her every wish.



Key Features:

Deep narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and high quality sex animations.
Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is intended for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains BDSM and incest. All characters shown in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Femdom Game World: Aunt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Femdom Game World: Aunt is a visual novel with a deep plot, intended for adult audience. You are a young guy who lives with his aunt. He just dreams of his aunt taking control over him. One day his dreams come true and his aunt becomes his Mistress.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
